keyFacts: The Brooklyn Human Trafficking Task Force circulated an invitation to a discussion about the Netflix documentary 'Jeffrey Epstein: Filthy Rich'.
The event was organized by ECPAT-USA, an anti-child exploitation organization, indicating institutional interest in Epstein's case.
Survivor Shawna Rivera was featured as a participant, highlighting the inclusion of victim testimony in public discourse about Epstein.
The email emphasizes the confidential nature of the communication, reflecting the sensitive handling of trafficking-related information by the District Attorney's Office.
